summary: Another lush for the remaining one. makes the game more amazing and lush .
descriptionHtml:
[Img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/15309-1-1334659854.gif[/img]


[size=4]
Hiiii guys now this is my best mod i ever created ........
                   As you all know about \"lush trees mod \" by opticshooter which was for making the pine trees more lush....and his another mod \"lush grasses\" which was for making the grasses more lush.
although both his mods was amazing ,,he forget about the aspen trees.
                 Whenever i look at any aspen tree photo ,,i noticed that they are dense and lush 
                 So i created this mod---------
[/size]

[size=5]STAR.2 Version[/size]
[color=yellow]
[size=4]
-Many peoples were requesting me to make a half sized version..
-So i prepared this version ,,it contains middle sized trees 
-and luckily the tree\'s top clipping problem was also solved
-all trees are with different sizes..
-and another important thing is that now their will be less frame-rates drop
[/size]
[/color]
[color=green]
[size=3]About new version \"STAR.PLUS\"[/size]
       
-I have created this version because my previous version was not fully supported the skyrim flora overhaul mod ...
-Means ,that their is a problem, that you will not get all the three colors of aspen trees provided by \"vurt\" by installing my previous version.
-So i solved this problem and now you all can enjoy the lush aspen trees with three different --colors if you had already installed the vurt\'s flora overhaul mod ..
[/color]
[center]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/15309-1-1335791968.jpg[/img]
[/center]
      
               ***USE THIS VERSION ONLY IF YOU ARE USING THE VURT\"S MOD*****
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[size=4]
[color=green]    
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/15067-1-1334654556.gif[/img]  
             
             -This mod will add more branches leaves to the aspen tree and will make them look more 
               realistic and better ..
             -I also made the tree log more bigger,,and tree stump more taller,as they seem\'s good to 
              me
             -aspen Trees are more tall and bigger ,which changes the experience of game 
            -And yes their\'s a bit of performance loss ,but very little even you will not be
             able to notice it. so don\"t be worry about it
            -Compatible with every mod ,,,
            -more tall and lush fallforest grasses
             
[/color]
[/size]
[center]
[size=6]
*Taller broken aspen stump\'s....
[/size]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/15067-2-1334655755.gif[/img]

[size=6]
*Bigger broken aspen log\'s.....
[/size]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/15067-1-1334655755.gif[/img]
[/center]


[size=6]
[color=red]
Most beautiful with \"Beautiful Whiterun  mod\" and \"WhiterunTrees mod \"
[/color]
[/size]

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/15309-1-1335793821.jpg[/img]

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/15309-1-1335793637.jpg[/img]

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/15309-2-1335118587.jpg[/img]

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/15309-1-1335118584.jpg[/img]

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////[size=3] {Thanks to \"spanian77 and \"Traphemetalgod\" for screenshots} [/size]

[size=4]                    
  \"So just hoping for the best\"
     \"PLEASE ENDROSE AND MAKE IT A \"HOT FILE\"
[/size]
author: Hritik
